name: Fungi (itch) (folhaslol)
description:
"Hundreds of years ago. Maybe millions of years. A group of people... found something. A portal to a world. A world... never seen before" - Fungi is a metroidvania game created and developed by folhas and plalo.

Controls: A (interact button), right and left (walk), Z (jump), X (attack), and Space to skip the initial cutscene!
